tool_description: Geo Location lookup for US zip codes, cities, counties, and states. Radius search, population data, & more!
name: US Geo Data
title: US Geo Data

api_list.name: Get Zips in Radius
api_list.description: Enter a zip code or latitude & longitude coordinates with a radius (in meters) to find other zip codes within the radius!

api_list.name: Lookup Zip Codes
api_list.description:
Enter one or more US zip codes for a basic zip code translation

**For many zips, separate by comma**

api_list.name: Get Zips in City
api_list.description:
Enter US city and State ID (ie "CA") to return all zip codes in a city.

**Optional**: sortByPopulation "asc" or "desc"

api_list.name: Get Zips in County
api_list.description:
Enter US county and State ID (ie "CA") to return all zip codes in a city.

**Optional**: sortByPopulation "asc" or "desc"

api_list.name: Get Zips in State
api_list.description:
Enter US State ID (ie "CA") to return all zip codes in a state.

*Optional*: sortByPopulation "asc" or "desc"
